name: World Pose

inputs.name: Transform
inputs.description: The Transform of the target pose

outputs.name: World Position
outputs.description: World position of the scene object

outputs.name: World Rotation
outputs.description: World rotation of the scene object

outputs.name: World Scale
outputs.description: World scale of the scene object

outputs.name: Up Dir
outputs.description: World Y direction (green arrow) of the scene object

outputs.name: Right Dir
outputs.description: World X direction (red arrow) direction of the scene object

outputs.name: Forward Dir
outputs.description: World Z direction (blue arrow) direction of the scene object

description: Get the world space position, rotation, and scale of a Transform component.
